Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:35:02
Folder: C1ECCG1 - lunch in the canteen(june 9-13)
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1ECCG1_00
From: Canteen.Lunch@chalhoub.com <Canteen.Lunch@chalhoub.com>
To: HO1Canteen
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-04 09:32
Subject: Lunch in the Canteen(June 9-13)
--------------------------------------------------





It’s time to book your canteen meals!

Let us know if you’re having lunch at the canteen next week!

If you haven’t already booked your meals for next week, please take a moment to do it now.



For those who did not make their booking in advance, we appreciate if you can come and have your lunch 1:40 onwards.



 	 Select dates and canteens <https://www.e-mac.com/en/Pages/canteen.aspx> 	  	 Unsubscribe <mailto:ITServiceDesk@chalhoub.com?subject=Please remove my email address from email distribution list Ho1canteen@chalhoub.com> 	  	 



If you are a new joiner and would like to register to the canteen, please contact IT Service Desk. 

To stop receiving our canteen booking emails, please Unsubscribe!
